article.headline: Bucknell 60, Robert Morris 45
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- Chris McNaughton scored 19 points -- including 11 in a decisive second-half run -- to lead Bucknell to a 60-45 win over Robert Morris on Tuesday night. Bucknell (5-4) trailed 30-28 with 13:54 to go in the game, but John Griffin hit a 3-pointer to give the Bison the lead and Kevin Bettencourt made a pair of 3s to make the score 37-30. Robert Morris (2-5) answered with a bucket, but McNaughton then outscored the Colonials 11-4 by himself over the next 3:42 to push Bucknell's lead to 48-36 with 7:15 to go. Charles Lee capped the 27-6 run with a layup two minutes later that made the score 55-38 and ended any threat by the Colonials. Chaz McCrommon led Robert Morris with 15 points and Maurice Carter added 13 for the Colonials, who shot just 16-of-50 from the floor for the game and 0-of-10 from beyond the 3-point line in the second half. Kevin Bettencourt added 10 points for the Bison, which shot over 50 percent from the floor in the second half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
